name: Brick Breaker Asyuura
description:
Hello everyone, this is a development update from the asyuura bamboo wall game, and this I build specifically for android, hopefully it's better than before, and also this is still the development stage where there are still many missing features

but i hope you enjoy it
  • Analog Button : move paddle.
  • Button Tap : launch ball.
  • control the paddle with the tip to control the direction of the ball

Thanks to these people for the great assets :

  • Michael Briscoe - Paddle sprite /Bamboo Sprite/ Ball Sprite
  • C PasteGame - 2D BackGround Game Jamle Cross - Sprite Brick Orange and Blue
  • Pandemonium - Sprite Sword  

Thanks for Playing.

I will update this game content later.
